name: Salesforce/wikitext
description: The WikiText dataset, a collection of over 100 million tokens from Wikipedia's verified Good and Featured articles, offers a unique opportunity for natural language processing research. Not only is it over twice the size of the preprocessed version of the Penn Treebank (PTB) for WikiText-2, but it is also over 110 times larger for WikiText-103. This dataset, available under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike License, is a valuable resource for tasks such as language modeling and masked language modeling, providing a diverse and extensive corpus of text data.
citeAs: @misc{merity2016pointer,       title={Pointer Sentinel Mixture Models},       author={Stephen Merity and Caiming Xiong and James Bradbury and Richard Socher},       year={2016},       eprint={1609.07843},       archivePrefix={arXiv},       primaryClass={cs.CL} }
creator: Salesforce
